etymologies: modern Latin, from the specific name of the wayfaring tree Viburnum lantana, which it resembles superficially

definitions: a tropical evergreen shrub of the verbena family, several kinds of which are cultivated as ornamentals.

notes.text: Genus Lantana, family Verbenaceae: many species, in particular the South American scrambler L. camara, grown as an ornamental and sometimes becoming an invasive weed

shortDefinitions: tropical evergreen shrub of verbena family
